law.history: Repealed 1996 Ky. Acts ch. 371, sec. 64, effective July 15, 1996. -- Created 1994 Ky. Acts ch. 512, Pt. 3, sec. 16, effective July 15, 1994.

metadata.catchline-at-repeal: Right to receive prior written statement of provider's charges for services and reimbursement to be paid provider -- Disclosure of reimbursement paid.
